quest.name: The Voice in the Abyss
journal: Fray has been waiting for you for a long time.

The voice, some say, is a beacon, guiding the dark knight to herhis true calling. As you grow more accustomed to drawing upon your darkside, you will come to hear the voice more clearly. Such are Fray's words to you when you ask herhim of the voice. Communion will hasten this process, shehe continues─but it cannot be conducted in Ishgard. Journey with Fray to Little Ala Mhigo in southern Thanalan.

“I want you to kill something for me,” Fray asks. “Something fearsome, which will push you to your limits.” SheHe wants to watch you thrive in that moment. And you want to show herhim. Gundobald should know of a suitable creature.

It saddens you to see how weak and complacent Gundobald has grown, and how his cowardice has spread amongst his people. They fear to tread near the lairs of mere peistes. But you do not. At least he furnished you with aldgoat meat for bait.
Fray stands apart, waiting for you to show herhim who you are. Find a suitable location for the bait.
You feel herhis eyes upon you, expectant. Hungry─like yours. Where are those godsdamned peistes...?
A dead peiste lies at your feet, and you feel alive. Somehow, you know Fray is smiling.

To mete out justice, one must be strong─a simple truth which you already knew, of course. You are ready for communion, but it will not be conducted here. South of Little Ala Mhigo─Fray is waiting for you there.

Fray bids you approach and begin the rite of communion. Close your eyes and hold out your hand. Breathe deep through your nose─let the air fill your lungs, then let it pass from your lips. Slower, slower...

In the abyss, a wanderer's voice sings to you. Forever moving, without rest or respite... Though its meaning yet eludes you, Fray tells you not to be discouraged, further adding that it might belong to an individual whom you are fated to seek out. If so, none can say how long it might take to find them...but the mere thought of the journey stirs something within you...

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Fray upon reaching level 40.
objectives: Rendezvous with Fray in Little Ala Mhigo.
Speak with Fray in the Red Labyrinth.
Place the aldgoat meat in the Red Labyrinth.
Lie in wait for a peiste.
Rendezvous with Fray south of Little Ala Mhigo.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I had a feeling you'd come by tonighttoday, Forename. And sure enough, there you are, eager to pick up where we left off.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Let's start with a question, then. You must be burning with several after that last affair.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you ask?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What was that voice I heard?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Why were you detained by the inquisition?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What became of the old woman and her granddaughter?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, the voice. The one you heard when you first touched the crystal. An excellent question, but a difficult one to answer.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Some say it is a beacon, guiding the dark knight to herhis true calling.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Whose is it, you ask? Only you can discover that, for each knight must hearken to a different voice.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: As you grow more accustomed to drawing upon your darkside, you will come to hear it more clearly.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Communion will hasten this process─but we dare not conduct the rites here, under the watchful eye of the Holy See.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: We will make for southern Thanalan. For Little Ala Mhigo.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Why do you think I was detained by zealous Temple Knights who see heretics around every corner?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: There was a girl. An innocent. They wanted her, and I objected.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Now then, are you ready to stop dancing around the real question and just ask?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Oh, for the love of─ They're fine, both of them. You solved all of their problems. Happy?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Now then, are you ready to stop dancing around the real question and just ask?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Punctual as ever, I see.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Communion, lest you worry, is rather simple. It is a ritual in which one nurtures the darkness within so that shehe may channel it more effectively in battle.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Do not, however, presume the risks to be any less than before. Should you partake of it in excess, you will die. Or worse. So before we begin, I want you to do me a favor.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I want you to kill something for me.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Something feral, something fearsome which will push you to your limits. I want to see you thrive in that moment. That way, I will know you are ready. Ask Gundobald─he should know of a suitable creature.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Come on, let's get this over with. I know you're not having second thoughts.

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: A pleasure to see you again, Forename. Do you require assistance?

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: Training? Well, if you seek dangerous beasts for that purpose, then...

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: The Red Labyrinth is home to peistes notorious for their size and vigor.

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: Our trappers take great pains to avoid their nests, and those who do not bear scars for their folly.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I pity the man who dies without scars. But these peistes sound promising. Tell me more.

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: ...They've attacked caravans loaded with aldgoat carcasses before. The smell drives them into a frenzy. This should serve to draw them out of hiding.

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: Forename, I'll always be grateful for what you did. Those young ones were on the verge of making a terrible mistake, so consumed with anger were they.

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: I hesitated to act, even though I saw it burning within them─as I see it burning within you now...

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: You...you seek the darkness within?

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: I will not claim to understand your meaning...but I wish you well in your training.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Let's go.

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: Take care, Forename. I trust you know what you are doing.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Ah, they're close. I can feel their eyes upon us...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Well, we're here. Show me who you are, Forename. Show me what you can do.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I'm waiting.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: They're just peistes, Forename. Don't pretend you haven't done this before.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: That wasn't so hard, now was it?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: To mete out justice─to protect the weak from the strong and so forth─you yourself must be strong.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Strength is pain. Strength is suffering. Strength is sacrifice.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: We must prepare for communion, but not here. Come, before more peistes are drawn by the smell.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You look ready. Good. Now listen well.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Close your eyes and hold out your hand towards me. Breathe deep through your nose─let the air fill your lungs, then let it pass from your lips. Slower, slower...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Listen to my voice. Listen to your heartbeat. Listen for the other...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With every breath you grow lighter and slip further into the abyss...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)One foot...in front of the other...over and over again...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)To the ends of the world...and back again...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)And if time has no end...still forward and onward...over and over again...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...So. What did you hear?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Interesting...but not terribly informative.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But do not lose heart. That you were able to hear it once more is progress enough.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I believe you will come to understand its words, and its will, in due time.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...I should mention that, in some instances, the voice is said to be that of another─one whom the dark knight is fated to seek out. If that is the case, you may have a long journey ahead of you...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Heh, so you would welcome such a journey?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: There is something to be said for it─and for travel, for that matter. To roam free and help those in need...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Yet no good deed goes unpunished, does it?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...I knew a womanman once. Wanted to be a hero, do great things. And so shehe did.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: The songs always end there. But life doesn't, does it?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...There are temptations more deadly than the darkside, Forename. You should've learned this by now, but you haven't. You will.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: The communion is ended, and with it, our time together. But we shall meet again, as we did before.
